author: Nigel J
title: London mini break
text:
We have just returned from a lovely 3 night stay here. The location is perfect 4 mins from Angel tube station & 20 mins walk from Kings Cross/St Pancras, there are a lot of local pubs, including a Wetherspoons for cheap drinks & food.
The hotel itself is spotlessly clean, staff friendly & it is very well run, it even has a MPW steak house restaurant.
The only problem we had was with the digital doorkeys keep locking us out of the room, had to recalibrate them a couple of times.
Overall we were highly satisfied with this hotel, would stay again & would definitely recommend to others.
